column5: Well, my Kansas NASCAR buddies and I (10 of us) decided to buy some Ontario Heart and Stroke foundation lottery tickets this year. Apparently the odds are 1 in 3. Tickets are $100.00 each, or 3 for $250.00. We bought 3. Today we were informed that we are the proud owners of a shiny new Hamilton Beach Panini Grill!! Value is 60 bucks. I have it reserved the week of November 19th to the 25th. All kidding aside, we are proud to support such a foundation. Chances are most of us will need their help sooner or later. Anyone else here win anything??
Nothing this year... I won luggage a few years back. No matter how many times Leah tells me to use it I'm still here!
I found $3.25 in the parking lot the other day getting out of my car....does that count
I "won" my money back last year.  But......about 10 or so years ago my buddy won the early bird prize. A Porsche 911, $25,000 and a 2 week trip to Australia.
Winner winner chicken dinner, I don't think so. Winner winner Sheen dinner.
